mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT E_NO , E_NM , E_ID , E_PW , (SELECT CD_NM FROM BASE_CD WHERE CD_TP = 'DEPT_CD' AND CD_V = E_DEPT) E_DEPT , (SELECT CD_NM FROM BASE_CD WHERE CD_TP = 'POSI_CD' AND CD_V = E_POSI) E_POSI , E_IN_DT , E_OUT_DT FROM EMP ORDER BY E_NO DESC ) B WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) WHERE RN >= #{start}
SELECT E_NO , E_NM , (SELECT CD_NM FROM BASE_CD WHERE CD_TP = 'POSI_CD' AND CD_V = E_POSI) E_POSI , E_IN_DT , E_OUT_DT FROM EMP ORDER BY E_NO DESC
SELECT E_NO , E_NM , E_ID , E_PW , E_DEPT , E_POSI , E_IN_DT , E_OUT_DT FROM EMP WHERE E_NO = #{eNo}
